meanings.sent1: The chef added chopped galangas to the curry for a burst of flavor.
meanings.sent2: In the market, you can find fresh galangas next to the other spices.
meanings.sent3: When the galangas started dancing in the pot, the dish turned into a spicy surprise.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of galangas filled the kitchen, transporting me to a tropical paradise.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the galangas made them stand out among the vegetables.

meanings.sent1: She loves to galangas her soups with aromatic spices.
meanings.sent2: When you galangas your dishes, the flavors become more complex.
meanings.sent3: As the chef continued to galangas the stew, the aroma filled the room.
